stories.content: Last weekend was amazing! I spent time with my friends, enjoyed the sunny weather, and we had a fantastic barbecue. Everyone was happy and we laughed all day long. It was the best weekend I've had in a long time!

Yesterday was a terrible day. Everything went wrong from the moment I woke up. My car broke down on the way to work, I missed an important meeting, and to top it all off, it started raining heavily as I walked home. It was just one bad thing after another.
Today was just an ordinary day. I went to work, did my job, and came back home. Nothing special happened, and it felt like any other day. I neither felt particularly happy nor sad, just indifferent.
